product_name: SmartWool NTS 250 Midweight Pattern Top - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Enjoy a bold design as well as warmth when you wear the women's SmartWool NTS 250 Midweight Pattern Crew Top. It's knit of SmartWool's warmest next-to-skin fabric for cold weather fun. Soft, nonirritating merino wool insulates, wicks away moisture and resists odors-naturally. Patterned knit provides a fun alternative to solid-colored base layers or tops. Back seams wrap to front to create a body enhancing fit; shoulder panels eliminate top shoulder seams for comfort under a pack. Flatlock internal seams offer exceptional next-to-skin smoothness. The women's SmartWool NTS 250 Midweight Pattern CrewTop does not itch and will not shrink; machine wash and dry. Closeout.
short_description: Enjoy a bold design as well as warmth when you wear the women's SmartWool NTS 250 Midweight Pattern Crew Top. It's knit of SmartWool's warmest next-to-skin fabric for cold weather fun.
